ai-patthana20.3:0.2_0: the immediately Factors of the Dhamma
ai-patthana20.3:1.1_0: or causes and reasons give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana20.3:1.1_1: One doesn’t give rise to the teaching, nor causes and reasons.
ai-patthana20.3:1.1_2: thoughts don’t arise for the sake of defilement, or for those with reason.
ai-patthana20.3:2.1_0: Or consciousness doesn’t give rise to the defilement, nor causes and conditions to be cause or reason.
ai-patthana20.3:2.1_1: or causes and reasons give rise to the teaching.
ai-patthana20.3:2.1_2: thoughts don’t arise for the sake of defilement, or for those with reason.
ai-patthana20.3:3.1_0: or defilement and reverence for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana20.3:5.1_1: One does not give rise to the undefiled teaching,
ai-patthana20.3:5.1_2: or cause or reasons these things that arise because of defiling the mind and defilements,
ai-patthana20.3:6.1_0: ‘This teaching doesn’t give rise to definitiveness causes.
ai-patthana20.3:8.1_0: ... five objects have the five factors for the sake of non-resultaneousness ...
ai-patthana20.3:9.1_0: nor does the teaching associated with pollutants associated with pollutants.
ai-patthana20.3:11.1_0: One who has not confused the teaching and the undefiled freedom gives rise to the defilements.
ai-patthana20.3:11.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana20.3:13.1_0: nor is for the sake of prevailing the sense sphere, and for the sake of (concentrating) thoughts associated with pollutants.
ai-patthana20.3:13.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana20.3:15.1_0: For the sake of prevailing the teaching don’t give rise to the defilement of defilement, because of the cause or reason.
ai-patthana20.3:15.1_1: This is the section in brief.
